operators.name: declaration operator
operators.description: allocates memory for an object on the stack or the heap, it in itself is either a copy or a reference to that object

operators.name: assignment operator
operators.description: sets the value of an object

operators.name: block operator
operators.description: used to declare the block in which the function resides in

operators.name: open operator
operators.description: used for various things, like PEMDAS or calling a function

operators.name: close operator
operators.description: used for various things, like PEMDAS or calling a function
